alert.note: Alert for Dunn; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dunn and eastern St. Croix Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Richmond, or 15 miles north of River Falls, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hammond around 150 PM CDT. Baldwin around 155 PM CDT. Woodville around 200 PM CDT. Glenwood City around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Boyceville and Knapp. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 21 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
